name: Line Breaker
description:
I'm taking a hiatus from work in order to work on games!

This is a simple little pet project inspired by the GMTK 2020 theme of "no control". This is a racing-like game where you have to stay on the track as long as possible, but have no control over the throttle after entering the track.

There are a few ideas I haven't implemented that I might get around to if I feel like it or this project generates interest. 

  • zig-zagging roads based on Bazier curves.
  • Bouncy tracks that the player reflects off of.
  • A local high score table.
  • An intro sequence where the player's ship drives through the SDL and FL Studio logos as well as the game's title before handing control over to the player.
  • Options for playing music or not and the settings for various graphical effects.
  • Should be fairly color-blind friendly already, but support for changing the colors if needed.

Mostly I just think it might be better for me to move onto another project.

Instructions for running on Linux and the source code is available at https://github.com/splinterofchaos/line-crasher. You don't need programming experience to compile code!
